page.title: 17TELEVISION AND THE PRESS
page.content: It was discoved in a survey of 60 families that all owned a television set and that more then half owned more than one.The people in the survey were mainly middle class. Teletex sets are not common but most people will consider obtaining one when they change their set. Television is viewed a great deal by all members of the family,the most popular programmes being 'Soap Operas' such as Dallas and Coronation Street. We were qute surprised to discover that The Sun was the most popular newspaper.The most popular Sunday Newspaper was the News of the World followed by the Sunday Times. Local Newspapers are widely read,the weekly Loughborough Echo selling most copies.This paper concentrates on local news and often contains stories about events in the area covered.
